thread.title: Man Utd target Antoine Griezmann talks future, Atletico Madrid and new stadium
thread.title_full: Man Utd target Antoine Griezmann talks future, Atletico Madrid and new stadium

title: Man Utd target Antoine Griezmann talks future, Atletico Madrid and new stadium
text: Man Utd target Antoine Griezmann talks future, Atletico Madrid and new stadium ANTOINE GRIEZMANN insists he is very happy at Atletico Madrid amid Manchester United’s interest. By Jack Staplehurst PUBLISHED: PUBLISHED: 04:15, Wed, Feb 15, 2017 Express Sport understands United are keen on signing the France international this summer as Jose Mourinho has made him his No1 target. The 25-year-old has an £86million buy-out clause, but that is not set to deter Manchester United in their pursuit. However, no agreement has yet been reached with Griezmann over his future. GETTY Antoine Griezmann is looking to win trophies with Atletico Madrid And the striker has outlined he is happy in Spain with Atletico’s projects in his mindset. The La Liga giants are leaving the Vicente Calderon at the end of the season and will be moving into their new stadium in the summer. Griezmann hints his future is not a dead certainty, but there are aspects such as winning titles that are keeping him at Atletico. How Man United could look with Antoine Griezmann Wed, February 1, 2017
